tool_description: Get Products information, reviews, offers, get to know about a specific product, and search for a product
name: Amazon Products Detail
title: Amazon Products Detail

api_list.name: Get a specific product
api_list.description: Get a specific product that you want from Amazon
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-products-detail1.p.rapidapi.com/products/B08N5KWB9H"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-products-detail1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://amazon-products-detail1.p.rapidapi.com/products/{b08n5kwb9h}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-products-detail1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Product Offers

api_list.name: Search Product
api_list.description: Search for a product using its product ID from Amazon
